EmailTemplate.name: UserGroups_2012.Confirmation-Grafton-MA_April-30
EmailTemplate.subject: CONFIRMATION: User Group Meeting | Grafton, MA on April 30
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2012 User Group Meeting Confirmation Monday - April 30, 2012 | Grafton PD | Grafton, MA Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for the following 2012 User Group Meeting - please review the information below:
Name: {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} {{lead.Last Name:default=edit me}} Attendee #2: {{lead.Contact 1:default=edit me}} Attendee #3: {{lead.Contact 2:default=edit me}} Attendee #4: {{lead.Contact 3:default=edit me}} Attendee #5: {{lead.Contact 4:default=edit me}} Service Name: {{company.Company Name:default=edit me}}
Registered for: Grafton, MA User Group Date: Monday, April 30, 2012 Time: 9:00 AM to Noon Address: Grafton PD, 26 Providence Rd, Grafton MA 01519 Available Seats: 35 Total
We look forward to seeing you there! QUESTIONS? If you have questions that you'd like to submit now for discussion at the respective user group meeting that you've registered for, please send them to: Cheri Lane Marketing Communications Manager cheri.lane@tritech.com
